calc module¶

Main class for calculating checksums

class calc.ChecksumThread(algorithm, data)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtCore.QThread

Worker thread to calculate checksums.

Args:
algorithm: Int. Index number of selected algorithm. data: A QListWidget or QLineEdit containing the file names to be processed.
get_hash(fname)[source]¶

Calculate the checksum.

run()[source]¶

Override of QThread run.

stop()[source]¶

Stop thread gracefully.
